alert.note: Alert for Coastal Citrus; Coastal Hernando; Inland Citrus; Inland Hernando (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 24 at 3:48PM EDT by NWS Tampa Bay
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Citrus, Sumter and northwestern Hernando Counties through 430 PM EDT... At 348 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 8 miles northwest of Crystal River Airport to 7 miles northeast of Inverness Highlands North to near Fruitland Park. Movement was south at 10 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Inverness, Wildwood, Bushnell, Homosassa Springs, Beverly Hills, Inverness Airport, Crystal River Airport, Black Diamond, Homosassa, Inverness Highlands South, Inverness Highlands North, Hernando, Sugarmill Woods, Lake Panasoffkee, Center Hill, Webster, Coleman, Arbor Lakes, Royal Highlands and Lecanto. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
